comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: American drama critic and author (1836-1917), "one of...the pre-eminent drama critics and biographers of the times." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Winter_(author) . His New York Times obituary: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60A17FF385F157A9... On March 14, 1916, he attended a tribute to his life and career, put on before 3,000 by the New York theater community, at the Century Theatre. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F30D13F9345C13...

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the information artolog. We will list his full name in the credits and change the date range since he died in 1917.
